insert into ope_sys_user (id, dr, org_department_id, org_staff_id, app_id, system_id, `password`, salt, `status`, login_name, last_login_time, last_login_token, last_login_ip, activation_time, expire_date, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, def1, def2, def3, def5, def6) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.dr}, #{item.orgDepartmentId}, #{item.orgStaffId}, #{item.appId}, #{item.systemId}, #{item.password}, #{item.salt}, #{item.status}, #{item.loginName}, #{item.lastLoginTime}, #{item.lastLoginToken}, #{item.lastLoginIp}, #{item.activationTime}, #{item.expireDate}, #{item.createdBy}, #{item.createdTime}, #{item.updatedBy}, #{item.updatedTime}, #{item.def1}, #{item.def2}, #{item.def3}, #{item.def5}, #{item.def6} )

insert into ope_sys_user (id, dr, org_department_id, org_staff_id, app_id, system_id, `password`, salt, `status`, login_name, last_login_time, last_login_token, last_login_ip, activation_time, expire_date, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, def1, def2, def3, def5, def6) values (#{id}, #{dr}, #{orgDepartmentId}, #{orgStaffId}, #{appId}, #{systemId}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{status}, #{loginName}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{lastLoginToken}, #{lastLoginIp}, #{activationTime}, #{expireDate}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedBy}, #{updatedTime}, #{def1}, #{def2}, #{def3}, #{def5}, #{def6}) on duplicate key update id = #{id}, dr = #{dr}, org_department_id = #{orgDepartmentId}, org_staff_id = #{orgStaffId}, app_id = #{appId}, system_id = #{systemId}, `password` = #{password}, salt = #{salt}, `status` = #{status}, login_name = #{loginName}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime}, last_login_token = #{lastLoginToken}, last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp}, activation_time = #{activationTime}, expire_date = #{expireDate}, created_by = #{createdBy}, created_time = #{createdTime}, updated_by = #{updatedBy}, updated_time = #{updatedTime}, def1 = #{def1}, def2 = #{def2}, def3 = #{def3}, def5 = #{def5}, def6 = #{def6}
